categories: Her Spur Light Cushion Hiker Boot Socks
description: Lightly cushioned hiking socks made of a naturally antimicrobial merino wool blend that stands up to multi-day backpacking trips. Bright stripes keep the pep in your step.Made of fine-gauge merino wool, nylon and spandex to keep your feet cool in the summer, warm in winter.Merino is naturally antimicrobial and prevents your feet from getting funky.True Seamless™ construction fuses seams for chafe-free wear.Darn Tough sources their wool from non-mulesed sheep.
name: Darn Tough Her Spur Light Cushion Hiker Boot Socks - Women's
